name: Light-Ball
description:
Hi ! This game is a little challenge that a friend gave me. I had to create a simple and fun game, without using external ressources, except for musics and sounds. So here is this game ! 

It is like a pong, but better. Indeed, each player can control 2 pads and I modified a little bit the collisions to get closer to things we can see in a football match ! 

To conclude, this game is a fun 2-Player Game that I advise you to try. Enjoy ;) !
